desmoj.extensions.xml.report

Class XMLReportOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.report.FileOutput
      • desmoj.extensions.xml.report.XMLOutput
        • desmoj.extensions.xml.report.XMLReportOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver, OutputType

    public class XMLReportOutput
extends XMLOutput
implements OutputType
    Class to receive information from reporters and create an xml file out of it.
